issue.title: [C++] Consolidate IO interfaces used in arrow/io and parquet-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the codebase consolidation, we have the opportunity to remove cruft from the Parquet codebase. I believe it would be simpler and better for the ecosystem to use the Arrow IO interface classes rather than maintaining separate vitual IO interfaces exported from the `parquet::` namespace

comments.body:
